Kako aluminijasta folija olajša likanje perila
Obstaja preprost način, s katerim bo nadležno gospodinjsko opravilo preprostejše.
06 Nov 2019, 08:32 by M. F.
Zakaj bi morali v boben pralnega ali sušilnega stroja dodati nekaj kroglic iz zmečkane aluminijaste folije? Odgovorov na to vprašanje je več.
Lažje likanje in brez statične elektrike
Ker bo perilo, oprano v njihovi družbi, mehko tudi brez uporabe mehčalca, hkrati pa se bo med pranjem in sušenjem v stroju manj zmečkalo in ga bo zato lažje likati. Prav tako kroglice aluminijaste folije pripomorejo k učinkovitejšemu pranju in preprečujejo statično elektriko.
Koliko?
Za vse te učinke zmečkajte tri kose aluminijaste folije v velikost teniških žogic in jih dodajte med pranjem ali sušenjem perila. Nad učinkom ne boste razočarani.

How aluminum foil makes ironing easier
There is an easy way to make annoying household chores easier.
06 Nov 2019, 08:32 by M.F.
Why should you have some crumpled aluminum foil balls added to the washer or dryer drum? There are several answers to this question.
Easier ironing and no static electricity
Because the laundry washed in their company will be soft even without the use of a softener, and will be less crushed during washing and drying in the machine and therefore easier to iron. Also, aluminum foil balls help to wash more efficiently and prevent static electricity.
How much?
For all these effects, crush three pieces of aluminum foil the size of tennis balls and add them while washing or drying laundry. You will not be disappointed with the effect.
